video_prompt: A stylized anime character with melancholic expression shifts, her light hair, dark eyes, and form-fitting dark top subtly adjust. She subtly grips an electric bass with a purple-gloved hand, a metal chain subtly moves around her leg, as the blueprint-style background behind her slowly morphs its grid lines and numbers into new configurations.
image_prompt: anime-style black and white pencil sketch of a melancholic young woman with light hair in a messy bun, wearing a dark crop top and ripped jeans, holding a dark electric bass with pink accents. Her hands wear purple fingerless gloves. The background features architectural blueprint elements: grid lines, illegible text, and technical markings.
refined_video_prompt: The anime character's melancholic expression subtly shifts as her light hair and form-fitting dark top gently adjust. A purple-gloved hand subtly tightens its grip on an electric bass, while a metal chain softly sways around her leg. The blueprint background behind her dynamically morphs, its grid lines and numbers continuously reconfiguring into new patterns.
